attributes.action: Make Wainwrights Coast to Coast Walk a National Route
attributes.additional_details: Wainwrights Coast to Coast Walk is one of the most popular walks in the UK with over 10,000 people walking it each year from all over the world. It should be given National Route status to provide resources to maintain the quality of the walk. This will ensure interest is maintained in the walk which also supports a host of local small rural  businesses.
